AboutUs.information-text-p1: The mission of Nobi Tour is to facilitate planning and make travel accessible to everyone. Our main concept is that you organize (create) your trip yourself. Nobi offers guests amazing business or leisure options, transportation services and accommodation. On our website you can plan an excursion program. Don't know where to find a babysitter while on vacation? Need extra items delivered to your room? Looking for sports equipment for rent?
AboutUs.information-text-p2: Our partner is here to assist you with everything. It is a platform where you can find products, services and events. All in one place - goods, services and events. Check out
AboutUs.information-text-p3: We invite partners to cooperate! Do you have interesting accommodation options, entertainment and excursion programs, services for travelers? We will help you attract new guests and make your business more successful. Register on our portal and tell us about yourself.
AboutUs.information-text-p4: There are many excursions to choose from - choose routes that are of interest to you and your loved ones. Create your exciting trips and business trips directly on our website and travel easily and simply! Wherever you go and whatever you want to do, Nobi Tour will help you with this. Our team consists of experienced professionals who are always ready to help you. The company's support service works around the clock and seven days a week

FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q1: Where can I find additional products/services? How it works?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a1p1: You can order the desired product or service on the website
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a1p2: and we will promptly deliver it to where you need it.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a1li1: You select the necessary things / services in the catalog, place an order, where you write: the date, place and time of delivery of your order.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a1li2: We will contact you to confirm and clarify the details if necessary.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a1li3: Delivery to the door. On the specified date, the service you have chosen will be available to you or the courier will bring your order.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q2: Check if you can pay with Visa and Mastercard
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a2: Payment by Visa and Mastercard cards of Russian banks is possible. When choosing a payment on the site, you can use any card of these payment systems, both when booking accommodation in Russia and abroad. Payment by foreign cards, unfortunately, is not possible.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a3: In order to book, click on the 'Hotels' button and fill in the search query on the left. Select the hotel you like from the list by clicking on it, after which the 'book' button will appear on the right side of the page.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q4: How to book a hotel in Russia?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a4: To book, click on the 'Hotels' button and an orange 'Hotel Booking in Russia' button will appear on the right. Clicking on it will take you to the search page for selecting hotels. Select the desired one from the list, click on the right button 'book', after which you will be redirected to the page for booking.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a5: To book, click on the 'Flights' button. Clicking on it will take you to the search page. Select the desired direction and click 'search'. Choose the option you want and click on the orange 'book' button. This will take you to the booking page.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q6: How to book an excursion during the trip?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a6: To book, click the 'Impressions' button. In the search, enter the direction and dates. In the list, select the desired option, click on it, the field of which will be the 'book' button on the right. You will be taken to the booking page.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a6.2: To book excursions in Russia - click on 'Impressions', on the right there will be an orange button 'Order excursions in Russia'. Click on it, then enter the direction you need in the search bar. In the list, select the desired option, click on it, the field of which will be the 'book' button on the right. You will be taken to the booking page.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a7: To book, click on the 'Rent a car' button. In the search, enter the direction and dates. In the list, select the desired option, click on it, the field of which will be the blue button 'book' on the right. You will be taken to the booking page.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a8: To book, click the 'Transfer' button. In the search, enter the direction and dates. In the list, select the desired option, click on it, the field of which will be a green 'book' button on the right. You will see a field for filling in information on booking.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a9: Please note that now insurance is available only for citizens of the Russian Federation.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a9.2: To purchase insurance, click on the 'Insurance' button. In the search, enter the direction and dates. In the list, select the desired option, click on it, the field of which will be the yellow button 'book' below. You will see a field for filling in information on booking.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q10: How to buy a bus ticket?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a10: To book, click on the 'Buses' button. Clicking on it will take you to the search page. Select the desired direction and click 'search'. Choose the option you want and click on the orange 'buy' button. After that, you will see a page with a field to fill out for booking.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q11: Я оплатил бронирование. Где мне найти подтверждение оплаты и бронирования?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a11: Подтверждение оплаты вы найдете в письме-подтверждении бронирования. Там же можно скачать подтверждение оплаты в формате PDF.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q12: Do I need to pay anything extra upon arrival?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a12: In some cases, you may be required to pay taxes and other fees upon check-in. Their amount must be indicated before the completion of the booking and in the confirmation letter. If the amount is not indicated in this way, nothing needs to be paid.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a13: If the booking is non-refundable, it cannot be cancelled. If the booking is partially refundable or can be canceled free of charge, please open the confirmation email or confirmation page in the 'Bookings' section of your account to see the penalties.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q14: Can I make changes to a booking?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a14: Partial changes are possible. Contact support for a quick resolution of the issue.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q15: My booking has been cancelled. What to do?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a15: As this booking was processed by a partner company, an overbooking may have occurred at the property. In this case, the partner company informs us, after which we refund your payment and cancel the booking.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a15.2: It may take 7 to 10 days to process the transaction, depending on your bank. If you have questions, please contact the bank directly.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q16: Where can I find the cancellation policy?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q17: I paid for the booking but did not receive a confirmation email.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a17: After booking, you will receive a confirmation email from us. It usually arrives within two minutes, but it may take a little longer. Don't forget to check your Spam folder: the email may end up there by mistake. If you do not receive an email, please contact our support team.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q18: How can I request a special check-in or check-out time?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a18: If you require an early or late check-in or check-out, please contact the property directly 1-2 days prior to check-in. Your request may be fulfilled, but not guaranteed.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q19: Is it possible to request extra beds for children?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a19: It depends on the property's policy. Usually, the supplement for children, including extra beds or baby cots, is not included in the final price. Please contact the property directly 1-2 days prior to arrival to learn more.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q20: Is food included in my stay?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a20: Your confirmation letter will indicate whether meals are included in your stay or not. Sometimes it is possible to add meals to the accommodation upon arrival. Please contact the property directly 1-2 days prior to arrival for details.
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.q21: Upon arrival, it turned out that the accommodation did not match the photo. What to do?
FrequentlyAskedQuestions.a21: Send a screenshot of the incorrect information to our support team. If you had to pay any additional fees, send a check.

Transfer.invalidForm: Form is invalid. Please fill in all required fields.
Transfer.didntFindNeeded: Didn't find what you need? Check out more options here
Transfer.question: Question
Transfer.perkOne: Our drivers have at least 7 years of experience
Transfer.perkThree: All cars have working air conditioning
Transfer.q1: How do I know that my order is confirmed?
Transfer.a1: After submitting the order form, a manager will contact you within 5-10 minutes to confirm the order and clarify trip details.
Transfer.q2: Do I need to change cars after crossing the border?
Transfer.a2: We value the time and comfort of each passenger, so from the beginning to the end of the trip, there is one driver, and there are no transfers to another car!
Transfer.q3: We have children, is there a child seat?
Transfer.a3: We prioritize safety and, upon request, provide boosters, seats, and child car seats (included in the trip cost). According to traffic rules, children aged 7 to 11 can be fastened with standard seat belts when traveling in the back. Dear parents, consider the height, weight, and build of your children; not every trip with a child car seat may be safe for the child! In any case, a manager can always advise you on these matters.
Transfer.q4: If I can't find my route?
Transfer.a4: If you haven't found the desired route in the search, contact the manager for assistance. You can send an email to our email, or call/write on WhatsApp at +7 (940) 910-30-10. Specify all the details and requirements for the route so that the staff can offer you the most suitable alternatives and help with the application. The manager's response will come within 5-10 minutes.
Transfer.q5: Can I pay for the order from a legal entity?
Transfer.a5: Yes, we make a contract, send payment details, or issue an invoice for the organization/company.
Transfer.q6: Is the price per car or per person?
Transfer.a6: The cost of individual transfer is given for the entire car, not per passenger.
Transfer.q7: I am traveling with animals, what are the rules?
Transfer.a7: We are FOR traveling with your pets, but it is necessary to follow certain rules to ensure the safety of the pet, driver, and passengers. Use special carriers (in their absence, ensure that the animal is securely fastened with a collar/leash). When crossing the border, you must have all the necessary documents for this. The surcharge for transporting a specific animal is determined individually.
Transfer.a8: If you found an error or the address of arrival/departure has changed when placing the order, write to the manager on WhatsApp/email and inform them. We will help you correct the order and advise on the cost of the trip.
Transfer.q9: What guarantees that you will meet me?
Transfer.a9: We work officially. Our reputation is more important to us than anything. We are interested in the quality of the services provided, in your mood at the beginning or end of the trip, and we process every offer from the client. Each year we get better! You can always call or write to us on WhatsApp/email. We also actively manage pages on VK, Instagram. All reviews are only from real customers.
Transfer.q10: Can the price change after booking?
Transfer.a10: The price is fixed at the time of booking the trip and can only change in case of additional stops on the way to the destination (stores/pharmacies, etc.)
Transfer.q11: How much time in advance should I apply for a transfer?
Transfer.a11: We recommend applying no later than 3 days before arrival/departure (you can even a month). But! If there are less than 24 hours left before the trip or you are already on the spot, you can always write/call us on WhatsApp at the specified phone number +7 (940) 910-30-10, we will try to find a driver and inform you if we can provide a transfer.

Policy.p1: If you continue to use our site, you agree to the following rules. We ensure compliance with international data protection regulations and the requirements of the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation).
Policy.p2: These terms of use explain how we collect and use your personal data. If you have any questions or need clarification regarding the use of your personal data, please contact us using the contact form.
Policy.p3: Cookies are stored in your browser for the purpose of personalizing your experience of using the site. By accepting the cookie policy, you agree to the use of cookies. We use cookies to improve your experience on our site and to receive error reports while using our site.
Policy.p4: The personal information we collect during your visit to the site may include your name, email address, phone number, and IP address. To use the services of our site, you may need to complete the registration procedure or provide personal information. We collect this information only when you make a purchase or register on the site and we need this information in order to identify and register you as a user, confirm your purchase and contact you about our services and products, or in order to respond to your inquiries. Your phone number may be used to contact you to confirm a purchase if you are unable to verify it via email. We do not share this information with third parties, and you can be sure that this information is securely stored.
Policy.p5: When you use our site, we may use your IP address to determine your location. Information about your location will help us personalize your experience on the site and use some of the site's features, such as searching for ads on a map. Your location will help us show relevant ads near your location. We also use your location to serve targeted Google ads and banners.
Policy.p6: When making a purchase on our site, you enter your credit card information or payment processor address to complete the purchase process. Given the fact that the entire payment process is handled by payment processors, we do not store your credit card information and do not have access to payment information at any stage of the purchase process.
Policy.p7: By using our site, you agree to receive system notifications to your email address. Notifications may contain information about the added ad, a warning that the ad will expire and it will be removed from the site if you do not update it, as well as other types of notifications related to the operation of the site. System notifications serve as reminders or useful tips to enhance your experience on the site. You cannot unsubscribe from system notifications and the only way to stop receiving them is to delete your account on our website.

PaymentReturnPolicy.name: Payment and return policy
PaymentReturnPolicy.p1: At the time of booking, you agree to pay the cost of the travel product, including any fees and taxes that may apply.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p2: Some prices may have been rounded to the nearest whole number. (although the actual difference would be negligible anyway).
PaymentReturnPolicy.p3: Obvious errors and typographical errors are not binding. For example: if you book a premium tour that was mistakenly offered for €1, we can cancel that booking and refund the full amount paid.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p4: For some services, the Provider requires prepayment or payment made at the time the travel product is provided to you.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p5: If we arrange your payment, we (or in some cases our affiliate) are responsible for managing your payment and executing your transaction with our service provider. In this case, your payment represents the final set-off of the payable.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p6: If you are charged by a Service Provider, this will usually be in your presence at the start of providing you with the travel product, but it may also be that your credit card is charged when you book or you pay when you leave the Accommodation. This is subject to the Service Provider's prepayment policy, which will be communicated to you during the booking process.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p7: If the Service Provider requires prepayment, it may be debited or held as a hold at the time of booking and may be non-refundable. Therefore, please read the Service Provider's prepayment policies before booking.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p8: We have no influence on these rules and are not responsible for them.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p9: If the currency selected on the Platform does not match the Service Provider's currency, we may display prices in your currency and offer you to pay for your booking in your currency. Your card issuer may charge you a fee for a foreign currency transaction.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p10: We will retain your payment method information for future transactions after receiving your consent.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p11: By making a Booking, you accept the applicable policies displayed during the booking process. You will find each Service Provider's cancellation policy and any other policies (about age requirements, deposits/deposits, group booking surcharges, extra beds, breakfast and pets, accepted cards, etc.) on our Platform: at information page of the Service Provider, during the booking process, in the important information section and in the booking confirmation email.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p12: In the case of your cancellation or no-show, any cancellation/no-show fees and any refund will be subject to the service provider's cancellation/no-show policy.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p13: Some bookings cannot be canceled free of charge, while others can only be canceled free of charge up to a certain time.
PaymentReturnPolicy.p14: If you have booked a travel product and paid in advance, the service provider may cancel the booking without notice if it cannot receive the balance on the relevant date. If they do so, any non-refundable payment you make will be refunded at the sole discretion of the service provider. You are responsible for ensuring that the payment is made on time (that your bank, debit card or credit card details are correct and that there are sufficient funds in your account).
PaymentReturnPolicy.p15: If you think you will not arrive on time, please contact your Service Provider and let them know when they can expect you so that they do not cancel your booking. If you are late, we are not responsible for the consequences (for example, the cancellation of your booking or any fees that the service provider may charge).
PaymentReturnPolicy.p16: As the person making the Booking, you are responsible for the actions and conduct of all members of your group. You are also responsible for obtaining consent from these individuals before providing us with their personal information.

UserAgreementTerms.p2: By using the services offered by www.nobitour.com, you accept the terms and conditions of the "Terms of Use Agreement" set out below, regardless of whether you are a "Guest" (which means simply using the service) or a "Registered User" (which means registering on www.nobitour.com website), as well as regardless of the purpose and subject of use.
UserAgreementTerms.p4: www.nobitour.com is an information search system that provides access to information about products, services, and events intended for potential Consumers (Buyers).
UserAgreementTerms.p6: Agreement - Agreement on the terms of use of the resource www.nobitour.com.
UserAgreementTerms.p7: Administrator - administrators, moderators, copyright holders, and other legal owners of the www.nobitour.com.com resource.
UserAgreementTerms.p8: Resource (Service) – an automated information system available on the internet at (including subdomains): https://nobitour.com
UserAgreementTerms.p9: Materials - information posted on the resource: texts, articles, photographs, video images.
UserAgreementTerms.p10: User - a specific person or organization that visits the www.nobitour.com Internet resource.
UserAgreementTerms.p12: A necessary condition for using the www.nobitour.com service is the User's consent to act in full compliance with all applicable international law, as well as in accordance with this agreement.
UserAgreementTerms.p13: Service Administrators may change the agreement at any time. Any changes to this agreement come into force from the moment they are published on the website www.nobitour.com. By continuing to use the www.nobiarts.com service after the publication of changes, you agree to act in accordance with the terms specified in the modified agreement.
UserAgreementTerms.p14: Visiting and using the resource means that the User accepts all the terms of this agreement in full without any exceptions and restrictions. Use of the resource on other terms is not allowed.
UserAgreementTerms.p15: Due to the fact that the active link to the agreement is placed on the main page of the resource and is available to an indefinite circle of people, the agreement is considered concluded from the moment a special mark (tick) is put on the line “I accept the terms of the agreement” or the “Register” button is pressed during registration on the corresponding page of the site www.nobiarts.com and is recognized by the parties as an acceptance made even though the User is not registered on the resource.
UserAgreementTerms.p17: The resource in legal terms is an information database. The administrators of the Service own the copyright for the selection and arrangement of the materials they have made. The Service Materials may contain trademarks, service marks, and trade names.
UserAgreementTerms.p18: The design, structure of the resource, image, graphics, and other elements that are the object of protection cannot be reproduced in whole or in part to create new information objects, except in cases of contractual or partnership relations with the resource administrators, while the reproduction conditions are negotiated in each case individually.
UserAgreementTerms.p19: Certain portions of this resource may be password protected and may require User registration to view them.
UserAgreementTerms.p20: After the registration process on our resource, the User, free of charge, unless otherwise agreed separately, is provided with an account and a password that allows access to all services and services of www.nobitour.com. The User undertakes to maintain the confidentiality of the password and is solely responsible for any damage and any liability resulting from the failure to maintain the confidentiality of the password.
UserAgreementTerms.p21: The User of the resource undertakes:
UserAgreementTerms.p22: - not to reverse engineer, attempt to access the source code, distribute or create any derivative works based on the use of the resource or any of its parts;
UserAgreementTerms.p23: - not to enter the resource in any way other than the interface provided by www.nobitour.com. In addition, any software accessed through this Service, including but not limited to all HTML codes and online controls, is the property of the administrators. Any reproduction or redistribution of this software is strictly prohibited;
UserAgreementTerms.p24: - not to use any of the trademarks, logos, or trade names from the resource, as well as any other copyright information, including graphic images, as well as the interface/design of any page or any form contained on the service page without obtaining the prior written consent of the Service Administrator.
UserAgreementTerms.p25: The resource administrator may, at its discretion and without prior notice, prohibit or restrict the use of the resource by the User.
UserAgreementTerms.p26: Reasons for these measures may include, but are not limited to:
UserAgreementTerms.p27: - violation of these Terms of Use or other agreements with the administration www.nobitour.com;
UserAgreementTerms.p28: - relevant requests from law enforcement or other government agencies;
UserAgreementTerms.p29: - the occurrence of unexpected technical problems or problems with the security system;
UserAgreementTerms.p30: - participation of the User in fraudulent or illegal transactions, failure to pay any amounts of money charged for the provision of services;
UserAgreementTerms.p31: - it is not allowed to use this service for profit, except for contractual relations with the administrators of the resource;
